value.title: StarCraft 2: Cure NUKES His Own Base! (herO vs Cure)
value.excerpt: Professional match of top level Korean StarCraft 2 between herO (Protoss) and Cure (Terran). While Cure opens up with some strange decisions, ultimately he gets to comfortably macro on three bases. herO tries to find weaknesses in his defense, but is forced to face a maxed out Terran army.
